description: Core Parsing Engine - Zero-copy AST extraction with multi-language support using tree-sitter. Part of LeIndex Rust Renaissance master track.

performance_targets.parsing_speed: Parallel processing with rayon for 50K+ files
performance_targets.language_support: 12 supported languages (Python, JS/TS, Go, Rust, Java, C++, C#, Ruby, PHP, Lua, Scala); 3 disabled (Swift, Kotlin, Dart) due to compatibility issues

completed_tasks: Task 3.6: Implement remaining languages (Java, C++, C#, Ruby, PHP, Lua, Scala)
Task 3.8: Implement all Tzar review recommendations (Lua/Scala CFG/complexity, docstrings, error propagation)
implementation_summary.test_results: 94/94 tests passing for 12 supported languages (all critical issues resolved)
disabled_languages: Swift: tree-sitter version incompatibility (grammar v15 vs library v13-14)
Dart: parsing issues with function_definition node kind

tzar_reviews.phase_1: PASS - Unified language registry, no duplicate unsafe FFI, MSRV compliant (Rust 1.75+)
tzar_reviews.phase_2: PASS - True zero-copy architecture, bounds checking, no type duplication
tzar_reviews.phase_3: PASS - 94/94 tests passing, 12 languages fully supported, all critical issues resolved (commit 9048f64)

key_achievements: Thread-safe lazy-loaded grammar cache with once_cell::sync::Lazy
Zero-copy AST architecture with byte-range references
Full Python CodeIntelligence implementation with nested function tracking
Full JavaScript/TypeScript CodeIntelligence implementation with arrow functions, classes, types
Full Go CodeIntelligence implementation with interfaces, goroutines
Full Rust CodeIntelligence implementation with traits, lifetimes, impl blocks
Full Java CodeIntelligence implementation with classes, interfaces, enums
Full C++ CodeIntelligence implementation with namespaces, classes, structs, enums
Full C# CodeIntelligence implementation with local_function_statement support and XML doc extraction
Full Ruby CodeIntelligence implementation with classes, methods
Full PHP CodeIntelligence implementation with PHPDoc extraction
Full Lua CodeIntelligence implementation with CFG, complexity, parameters, and docstring extraction
Full Scala CodeIntelligence implementation with CFG, complexity, parameters, and scaladoc extraction
Control flow graph generation for all 12 languages
Cyclomatic complexity calculation for all 12 languages
Proper error propagation in GrammarCache (descriptive panic on lock poisoning)
Tzar Review Phase 1: PASS (unified registry, MSRV compliant, no duplicate code)
Tzar Review Phase 2: PASS (bounds checking, zero-copy verified, no type dup)
Tzar Review Phase 3: PASS (94 tests passing, 12 languages, all issues resolved)
